template.template: RR Mikrotik SNMP Interf. Status Link Downs VPLS
template.name: RR Mikrotik SNMP Interf. Status Link Downs VPLS

trigger_prototype.expression: {RR Mikrotik SNMP Interf. Status Link Downs VPLS:interface.downs[{#SNMPVALUE}].diff(0)}>0
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {RR Mikrotik SNMP Interf. Status Link Downs VPLS:interface.status[{#SNMPVALUE}].last()}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Link Downs {#SNMPVALUE}

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME} - {#IFALIAS} : Sinal TX Est√° acima de -26dBm
